login.role_mismatch: This account is registered as: {role}. Please log in using the {role} profile.

PROFILE_PHOTO_ALREADY_EXISTS: Profile photo already exists. Use overwrite=true to replace.
UPLOADING_PROFILE_NOT_ALLOWED_TRY_OTHER_: Uploading profile photo via this API is not allowed. Please use the profile photo API.
FILE_NOT_FOUND_OR_DELETED: File not found or already deleted.
UNAUTHORIZED_DELETE_FILE: You are not authorized to delete this file.
SUBSCRIPTION_PLAN_NOT_FOUND: The subscription plan was not found.
ERROR_WHILE_FETCHING_TRANSACTION_DETAILS: An error occurred while fetching the transaction details.
ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED_USING_THIS_TRANSACTIO: This transaction ID has already been used for a subscription.
PAYMENT_AMOUNT_MISMATCH: The payment amount does not match the expected amount.
INVALID_DESTINATION_WALLET: The payment was sent to an incorrect wallet address.

TRANSACTION_PAYMENT_DETAILS_NOT_FOUND: Transaction payment details could not be found.
